definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia

sentences.english: Summer and winter season, from a can.
sentences.chinese: 冬夏換季，才能往返一次。

sentences.english: We provides Winter & Summer Shirts in different styles like, stripes, squares and others.
sentences.chinese: 本公司提供冬夏恤衫，包括直紋，格仔及其他系列。

sentences.english: And according to season, there were winter clothes and summer clothes.
sentences.chinese: 根據季節則有冬夏之分。

sentences.english: China is a monsoon climate, winter and summer temperature distribution varies considerably.
sentences.chinese: 我國屬季風性氣候區，冬夏氣溫分佈差異很大。

sentences.english: This weekend is Daylight Savings Time.
sentences.chinese: 本週末是冬夏時調整日。

sentences.english: Was good once was having your Spring and Autumn Period and the winter summer.
sentences.chinese: 好在曾經擁有你們的春秋和冬夏。

sentences.english: Printed spring summer and winter care.
The spring and autumn light, the brightness range between summer and winter.
sentences.chinese: 而春秋兩季的光線，其亮度介於冬夏之間。

sentences.english: Ten degrees higher than normal means the same thing in summer and winter.
sentences.chinese: 高出常溫10度在冬夏均是一回事。

sentences.english: Mulberry silk at a good temperature performance, small thermal conductivity, winter and summer are advised to wear.
sentences.chinese: 桑蠶絲隔溫性能好，導熱係數小，所以冬夏穿着均宜。

definition: the four seasons/spring, summer, autumn and winter
four seasons, namely: spring 春, summer 夏, autumn 秋 and winter 冬
Spring and Autumn Period (770-476 BC)/Spring and Autumn Annals, chronicle of Lu State (722-481 BC)
spring and autumn/four seasons/year/a person's age/annals (used in book titles)
